title: Shyt Lyst
description: FIN Goods is a wood shop located outside Boston, MA. The build and sell custom wood goods and only woods goods because wood is good, afterall.
extra: Somewhere on the product page is a gateaway into a virtual fitting room for testing out the furniture.

title: FIN Goods
description: FIN Goods is a wood shop located outside Boston, MA. The build and sell custom wood goods and only woods goods because wood is good, afterall.
extra: Somewhere on the product page is a gateaway into a virtual fitting room for testing out the furniture.

title: Separated
description: Separated is an immersive horror game set in the middle of nowhere. It aims to produce a blurring, once-in-a-lifetime experience.
extra: Try dragging some letters away on the sign in page.

title: Boxseats
description: Boxseats is a fantasy football-focused newsletter. Every Tuesday morning, they deliever game recaps (written by people who actually watched the games) directly to your inbox.
extra: Nothing. Just enjoy the gif of Bill Belichick looking through binoculars.

title: Kim Park
description: Kim Park is a photographer from London. She specializes in product photography and taking pictures of food.

title: Sneaky Jesus
description: Sneaky Jesus is a art brand from NYC. It follows the journeys of Jesus as he travels across the globe as if he really was just a stranger on the bus trying to make his way home.
extra: There's a hidden message somewhere on the site. That's all I'll say.

title: Cadillac Lounge
description: Cadillac Lounge is one of the oldest bars in Toronto, Canada. It has live music and was once the hangout for stars like Johnny Cash and Thelma & Louise.
extra: There's no need for extras when you've got that beautiful exterior.
